name: Square Shot
description: A simple but fun game where you destroy enemies, buy upgrades, and eventually defeat an epic boss!  This is the first game I have released so I hope you enjoy and any feedback is greatly appreciated! If you want to keep up to date on my new games or gaming videos then check out my YouTube here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-goEvJdjdj6uC9EcXizYEw
